pageContext.claim: “I hear we're making a lot of progress. I even hear certain members of Congress, the Democrats, are saying, We better get this thing going. This isn't working out too well for us.”
pageContext.analysis: According to a recent survey by the Washington Post, by a wide margin Americans blame President Trump and congressional Republicans for the shutdown — not the Democrats. Despite national addresses by both Democratic Leadership and President Trump, the shutdown appears to be a stalemate with little progress being made.
